'''1.8.2-pre7''' is the seventh and the final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.8.2]], released on February 16, 2015.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150220104601/https://mojang.com/2015/02/minecraft-1-8-2-pre7-almost-there-just-one-more/|title=Minecraft 1.8.2-pre7 – Almost there, just one more…|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Carrot on a stick]]'''
* Crafting one now removes all enchantments from the original fishing rod.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Ocelot]]s '''
* Now spawn at or above sea level rather than Y=63.

'''[[Squid]]'''
* Now spawn below sea level rather than Y=63.

=== General ===
'''[[Multiplayer]]'''
* Now directly takes the player back to the mulitplayer screen instead of the title screen when leaving a server.

== Trivia ==
This version was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
